remarks: The property of a uniquely specified ordered pair.  The proof uses properties of the ` iota ` description binder.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-May-2015.)
statement:
opiota.1 $e |- I = ( iota z E. x e. A E. y e. B ( z = <. x , y >. /\ ph ) ) $.
opiota.2 $e |- X = ( 1st ` I ) $.
opiota.3 $e |- Y = ( 2nd ` I ) $.
opiota.4 $e |- ( x = C -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
opiota.5 $e |- ( y = D -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
opiota $p |- ( E! z E. x e. A E. y e. B ( z = <. x , y >. /\ ph ) -> ( ( C e. A /\ D e. B /\ ch ) <-> ( C = X /\ D = Y ) ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d C x y z $.
$d D x y z $.
$d ch y $.
$d ph z $.
$d ps x $.
